Test2::IPC::Driver::Files(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Test2::IPC::Driver::Files(3)

NAME

Test2::IPC::Driver::Files - Temp dir + Files concurrency model.

DESCRIPTION

This is the default, and fallback concurrency model for Test2. This sends events between processes and threads using serialized files in a temporary directory. This is not particularly fast, but it works everywhere.

SYNOPSIS

    use Test2::IPC::Driver::Files;

    # IPC is now enabled

ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES

T2_KEEP_TEMPDIR=0
When true, the tempdir used by the IPC driver will not be deleted when the test is done.
T2_TEMPDIR_TEMPLATE='test2-XXXXXX'
This can be used to set the template for the IPC temp dir. The template should follow template specifications from File::Temp.

SEE ALSO

See Test2::IPC::Driver for methods.

SOURCE

The source code repository for Test2 can be found at http://github.com/Test-More/test-more/.
